product_overview: WebInHours is a comprehensive React-based marketplace platform designed to allow users to browse, purchase, and manage professional websites and AI agents. It features seamless authentication, a robust admin panel, user profile management, and an AI-powered chat assistant, all optimized for speed and performance using modern tools like React Query and Supabase backend.
core_goals: Enable users to easily browse and purchase professional websites and AI agents through a responsive and performant marketplace.
Provide secure and flexible user authentication with support for email/password and Google OAuth.
Offer comprehensive admin tools for managing websites, AI agents, user reviews, and live support chat.
Allow users to manage their profiles, view purchase history, and interact with AI chat assistant for support and guidance.
Ensure the platform delivers fast, seamless user experiences through aggressive caching, prefetching, and mobile optimizations.
Integrate analytics and tracking to gather insights on user behavior and product performance.
key_features: User Authentication with email/password and OAuth support, including protected and admin routes.
Dynamic Marketplace for websites and AI agents with filtering, search, detailed views, and prefetching for performance.
Admin Panel dashboard enabling CRUD operations, bulk management, metrics viewing, review moderation, and live support.
User Profile management with editable profile, stats overview, and purchase history.
AI Chat Assistant providing AI-powered conversation, message handling, quick actions, and sidebars.
Blog system supporting list and detailed posts to engage users with relevant content.
Project Calculator for estimating project costs and features.
Contact Forms with validation and submission tracking integrated with analytics.
SEO components including structured data and geo-schema for improved search visibility.
Performance optimizations including aggressive caching at HTTP, service worker, and query levels.
Google Analytics 4 integration for page and event tracking.
Theme management to support dark and light modes with context providers.
Responsive Layout Components including header, footer, sidebar, and navigation elements.
user_flow_summary: Users sign up or log in using email/password or Google OAuth and access protected marketplace and profile areas.
Users browse the marketplace with filtering and search options to find websites or AI agents, viewing detailed information and making purchases.
Admin users log in to the admin panel to manage website and AI agent listings, user reviews, and live support chat.
Users view and edit their profile information, see stats and purchase history, and interact with the AI chat assistant for help.
Users navigate to blog posts and read articles for information and engagement.
Users submit contact forms that trigger analytics tracking and receive confirmation.
Navigating marketplace items triggers prefetching and caching to optimize speed.
Theme switching allows users to toggle between dark and light modes seamlessly.
validation_criteria: Authentication must securely handle email/password and Google OAuth login flows, including protected and admin routes enforcement.
Marketplace browsing and searching should return filtered, paginated, and cached listings with instant load times on return visits.
Admin panel actions (CRUD) should reflect immediately with UI updates and proper validation for website, AI agent, and user management.
User profile edits and purchase history display must update accurately and persist changes.
AI chat assistant must send, receive, and display messages properly with quick action support.
SEO related components must render correct structured data and meta tags on relevant pages.
Contact form submissions trigger corresponding analytics events and validation errors appear appropriately.
Performance metrics (load time, cache hit rates) must meet defined thresholds for fast user experience.
Google Analytics events must be recorded for page views, button clicks, form submissions, and other key user actions.
Theme switching must persist user preference and update UI in real-time without reloads.
